resources.string: Blooming Beacon is a student community, registered with the Tamil Nadu Government of India, aiming at social welfare and betterment of the society.

We endeavor to unshackle women and children and deliver them their true power and dignity. We are a group of workaholics that focuses on every aspect of a problem and channelizes the youth\’s efficiency to ensure a solution sans loop holes.\n\n Our performance lies on both individual and team efforts to channelize the efforts in the right direction, with its motto\'s and aims towards social evolution.

"Modern invention has banished the spinning wheel, and the same law of progress makes the women of today a different woman from her grandmother." — said 'Susan B. Anthony'

We at Blooming Beacon are committed towards ensuring self protection for women and help them create self employment opportunities that would resonate in society for a long time to come.

We are also committed towards right to equality for women to prevent the social fabric of mankind.

It is a vital part of the organization where students are counseled upon various issues such as peer pressure, addiction, etc.

Members of the organization ought to find appropriate solutions and guide the young minds to the right direction.

Members at Blooming Beacon formed a students\’ community that marks to be a good companion to others and hence, developing better outcomes in one\’s personality.

With the successful events that follow up, we organize medical camps, blood donation camps, monthly visits to different orphanages and privileging the homeless with clothes and other necessities.\n\nHence, we strive to look forward to a better and self-sustained society against poverty and partiality.
Why are you interested in Social Service?
How can you help Blooming Beacon?
I can impart my skill set to the underprivileged.
Do you have any previous experience?

We will be saving the information that you\'ve entered above. We assure you that this information isn\'t shared with anyone else and that we store the information securely to the best of our knowledge.
